name: Vegan Green Chili Enchilada Soup
description: This one-pot Vegan Green Chile Enchilada Soup is vegan Mexican comfort food at its best! A hearty stew loaded with soy curls, corn and rice, then topped with all your favorite  toppings for tons of flavor!
recipeIngredient: 1 cup soy curls (rehydrated for 15 mins in warm chicken flavored broth then squeezed lightly Or use 1.5 cups shredded seitan)
1 tbsp nutritional yeast (use more if you want it cheesier)

recipeInstructions.text: Add oil to a saucepan over medium heat. Add the onion and garlic, and cook until translucent, 3 minutes.
recipeInstructions.name: Add oil to a saucepan over medium heat. Add the onion and garlic, and cook until translucent, 3 minutes.

recipeInstructions.text: Add in the green chilis and spices, and salt, mix well, and continue to cook until the chilis break down a little bit, about 6-8 minutes.
recipeInstructions.name: Add in the green chilis and spices, and salt, mix well, and continue to cook until the chilis break down a little bit, about 6-8 minutes.

recipeInstructions.text: Add in your soy curls, rice, corn, salt, and two cups of water.
recipeInstructions.name: Add in your soy curls, rice, corn, salt, and two cups of water.

recipeInstructions.text: Blend the cashews and 1 cup of water until smooth, and add it in, then bring the mixture to a good boil, and continue to cook for 15-20 minutes, or until the rice is cooked to preference.
recipeInstructions.name: Blend the cashews and 1 cup of water until smooth, and add it in, then bring the mixture to a good boil, and continue to cook for 15-20 minutes, or until the rice is cooked to preference.

recipeInstructions.text: Add in the Nutritional Yeast, mix in, taste and adjust salt. Adjust consistency with more water/broth if needed.
recipeInstructions.name: Add in the Nutritional Yeast, mix in, taste and adjust salt. Adjust consistency with more water/broth if needed.

recipeInstructions.text: Switch off heat. Let the soup sit for another 5 minutes, then serve topped with some sliced Jalapenos, and vegan cheese shreds.
recipeInstructions.name: Switch off heat. Let the soup sit for another 5 minutes, then serve topped with some sliced Jalapenos, and vegan cheese shreds.
